alert.note: Alert for Caddo; De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 6:24PM CDT until September 06 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DE SOTO...SOUTHWESTERN CADDO PARISHES IN NORTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND NORTHEASTERN PANOLA COUNTIES... At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Deberry, or 15 miles northeast of Carthage, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Deberry, Midyett, Deadwood, Front, and Spring Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
